snippet: After complications from knee surgery, Iris Nieves sank into a depression so severe she said she realized the only way out was to seek assistance.
abstract: Jewish Assn Serving the Aging, a beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, one of the seven organizations supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides Iris Nieves money for adjustable bed to help relieve her chronic pain.
lead_paragraph: After complications from knee surgery, Iris Nieves sank into a depression so severe she said she realized the only way out was to seek assistance.

headline.main: Climbing Out of a Deep Depression by Learning to Lean on Others
headline.print_headline: Climbing Out of a Deep Depression by Learning to Lean on Others

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
